events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I see on your website that I can get a refund.
The system identified this case as a Refund request based on keywords like return and refund mentioned by the customer.
A refund specialist agent has been assigned to handle the customer's return and refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with returning your jacket and processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so that I can process your refund request?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The jacket is too small for me, so I want to return it and get my money back.
I have submitted your refund request. Please ship the jacket back to us within 14 days using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thank you, that sounds good. I appreciate the quick help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We consider the refund case resolved from our side once you send back the jacket with the prepaid label provided.
Just checking in to confirm you received our return label email and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
The case has been closed following confirmation of return initiation. Please contact us anytime if you need more help.
We have sent you a short survey to let us know how satisfied you are with the refund process and customer support.
